title: Add lstm, gru, etc convenience functions to ATen
body_html:
Right now there is only the generic _cudnn_rnn which is (1) specialized for cuDNN, and (2) takes a magic number specifying what type of network you want. A more user friendly interface of some type would be good.

A minimal change that might be helpful is to just expose _cudnn_lstm, etc., which has the same interface as _cudnn_rnn but without the magic number.
